author: Seán Folan
title: Abide by restrictions 'for all our sakes' - Higgins
description: President Michael D Higgins has offered his "deepest sympathies" to people who have been bereaved during the coronavirus pandemic and appealed for everyone to abide by the restrictions that have been put in place.
content:
President Michael D Higgins has offered his "deepest sympathies" to people who have been bereaved during the coronavirus pandemic across the country and appealed for everyone to abide by the restrictions that have been put in place.
He also thanked on behalf… [+2549 chars]
